result.arabic_text: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱلۡحَيِّ ٱلَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا
result.translation: 58.Kaadu Nabiyow Yallay dudda-le manoley rabewaal kelitaay, kaa ceele waytaamak kaa saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu Yalli isi naqoosah dambih adda yaaxigem xiqah usun abba haanamak kaak Qellittam matanaay.
